name: Wander Movement Script
description: Implements wandering movement logic - NPC moves randomly in different directions

parameters.name: minWaitTime
parameters.description: Minimum wait time in seconds before next movement

parameters.name: maxWaitTime
parameters.description: Maximum wait time in seconds before next movement

parameters.name: maxBlockedAttempts
parameters.description: Maximum consecutive blocked movement attempts before giving up

parameters.name: rangeX
parameters.description: Maximum tiles NPC can wander horizontally from start position (0 = no limit)

parameters.name: rangeY
parameters.description: Maximum tiles NPC can wander vertically from start position (0 = no limit)
